titleStmt.title: A fruitful sermon necessary for the time preached at the Spittle vpon the Tuesday in Easter weeke last, by Frauncis Marbury. Published by direction of authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Marbury, Francis, d. 1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: By P. Short, dwelling on Breadstreet hill at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Running title reads: A sermon preached at the Spittle on Easter Tuesdaie, 1602.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Breadstreet hill at the signe of the Starre
